Delay
Duration
Hold still
Start recording by holding your phone still in the starting position
Do one repetition and move the phone back to the starting position
Keep your phone still in the starting position
Are you sure? Counters without a name won\'t be saved!
Move your phone in the starting position. (e.g. put it in your pocket and get in push up position)
Keep the phone still for a couple of seconds till it tells you to start recording. (Ensure that the volume is on)
Start moving. Do one repetition of your exercise. If the exercise should be done for both sides (e.g. left and right leg for lunges), do both of them in the same recording.

Finish the exercise by moving the phone back to its starting position and hold it still again for a couple of seconds till it tells you that it starts counting. Ensure that it is rotated correctly e.g. not up side down.
After finishing the recording, AllCount will automatically start counting further repetitions.
If you wan\'t to save an exercise simply give it a name and it will automatically show up in the list of your counters.
If you wan\'t to remove a counter simply remove its name.
